name: The Book of Everyone
slogan: A personalisation platform like no other
description: The Book of Everyone makes personalisation personal. It proves no matter who you are, you're amazing and have a unique story. The platform hosts over 250,000 proprietary art & copy assets that can instantly compiled into bespoke books, cards and posters. These are personalised in real time. Then rendered, printed and delivered anywhere in the world in a week.

jobs.title: Elixir & Elm Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
The Book of Everyone is a company making unique, personalized products in the most inventive and creative way we can. We’re basically a big overlap between tech and design, which is something you rarely see these days.


We are currently looking to incorporate a Full-stack Developer to our team. Our office is in Barcelona, just five minutes away from the beach. Imagine having a swim with the team and coming back to feast on a tasty BBQ. If that doesn’t pique your interest, I don’t know what will! Did I mention free haircuts and a fridge full of beer?

If you’re a person that likes working with the latest technologies, getting your hands dirty and is eager to learn, this is for you. You’ll be working in a small and lean team, reporting directly to the CTO.

You care about software: how it’s made, how to maintain it, and how to keep it working.

It doesn't matter that you've never used Elixir or Elm. Just send us your Github or talk to us about the projects you've worked on in the past.

The learning opportunities are endless, specially in a young and promising startup selling physical goods directly to the client, you’ll also feel at home alongside our talented team of developers.


This is a small team of developers and you have the autonomy to implement your own ideas and contribute to the company on a big scale.
